headline.main: If Marijuana Is Legal, Will Addiction Rise?

docs.abstract: What legal access to the drug might do to usage and abuse levels.
docs.lead_paragraph: A New York Times article on Sunday discussed the debate over whether more and more potent types of cannabis affect the levels of addiction to the drug. This particular issue has become part of the larger debate over whether marijuana should be legalized or decriminalized.
docs.snippet: What legal access to the drug might do to usage and abuse levels.

headline.seo: Marijuana Is Gateway Drug for Two Debates
headline.main: Marijuana Is Gateway Drug for Two Debates

byline.original: By SARAH KERSHAW and REBECCA CATHCART

docs.lead_paragraph: Marijuana’s increased potency is the opening for a debate on addiction, treatment and legalization.
docs.snippet: Marijuana’s increased potency is the opening for a debate on addiction, treatment and legalization.
